I still long for the vanilla yuri ALP doujin.
One day...
This needs to be translated man, its so good.

I still miss his older/love live days, where he did a lot more non-vanilla works: rape, mind break, mind control, etc. Their art is still amazing and is only getting better, it’s just I’ve never been able to relate to relatively “bland” vanilla sex paired with an actually decent looking guy. That’s not to say I like ugly bastard, far from it in fact. But I’ve always preferred the “self inserts” from hentai with average/lanky build and hair covering their eyes more than any from of actually detailed male character. What can I say, porn is for fantasy, and I like to think about males as little as possible in my fantasies.

Yes it will. The volume was uploaded (Japanese) a few months ago, and is now the #5 most popular japanese tankoubon in this site. The other 4 entries are over a year old, with the exception of the great torokase orgasm, which was uploaded 11 months ago as of now. 

Furthermore, torokase orgasm released an English uncensored version a few months later. That entry has >30k favs now. The second most popular entry this year. #5 most popular entry the last 2 years.

Who doesn't love alps work. His style is great and one can really feel the intensity, passion, love and lust coming from the young attractive couple while they indulge in the most primal of instincts. To add to that, none of his works (that are uploaded to this site) contain the netorare tag, and we all know how divided the community can be when it comes to that matter. Moreover, alp seems to be able to appreciate and convey the greatness of a good ass. Something that, in combination with the aforementioned point, is a recipe for distinction and eminence. 

With his style being extremely appealing to a large portion of the people, and the Japanese volume having received massive success, I think we're all excited to see the English release climb to the top ranks of this site we all love.
This is gonna be a big hit if the translated one being released
